summary: Internal email chain from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein (I/M #76318-054). The emails discuss a dispute over who should complete a competency report or SRA (Suicide Risk Assessment) for Epstein, with staff members arguing about work refusal and responsibility.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein

events.title: SRA conducted on Epstein
events.description: An unnamed staff member saw inmate Jeffrey Epstein for a Suicide Risk Assessment (SRA) the day before this email chain.

events.title: Dispute over competency report for Epstein
events.description: Internal email dispute at MCC New York about which staff member should complete a competency report for Jeffrey Epstein, following an SRA.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document is an internal email from July 24, 2019, concerning inmate Jeffrey Epstein (I/M #76318-054) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
It reveals a staff dispute over who should complete a competency report or Suicide Risk Assessment (SRA) for Epstein, with one staff member refusing work and others arguing about responsibility.
The correspondence indicates administrative confusion or conflict within the MCC regarding Epstein's assessment shortly before his death.
The email chain includes a forwarded message with the official DOJ/Federal Bureau of Prisons header for MCC New York.
